name: Expiration Date of Words
description:
This Visual Novel is under development. A demo is available for download!

================================================

☪ Intro

"I'd be glad to reintroduce myself. I identify as the Time. Nice to meet you.

Do you often keep things you have in mind to yourself?
Do you easily make regretful decisions in your life?

Welcome to Timeout.

☪ Extra

SPOILER AHEAD
「Expiration Date of Words」 is a short visual novel about a girl who wakes up in a place named 「Timeout」 after experiencing her father's death, due to a car accident. Here, she meets a mysterious figure who declares themself 「The Time」. 

~ The Story ~

The protagonist's father gets into a car accident. Unfortunately, he doesn't make it alive. 
The protagonist receives a call from the hospital that her father has passed away...
She quickly gets ready and leaves her house.
After arriving at the hospital in panic, she waits for a staff member to escort her to her dead father's corpse. 
After seeing his two closed eyes, she loses consciousness.

"Yo!"

Who could this be? Prominent black eyes with gross veins...and rigged blue overalls...?
*blink* now it's a person with six eyes.
*blink* now it's an...orca???

Apparently, it's 「The Time」.

"Time heals all wounds," he says.
The protagonist's pain from the experience in the hospital suddenly goes away in a blink of an eye. 

"...h...how did you...?"
"Told ya. I'm Time."

☪ Extra Extra

「Expiration Date of Words」 is a side project I'm working on, along with my main adult simulation 「Interspecies Mating Guide」! Make sure to check it out :D
